classmates = ["Michael", "Bob", "Tracy"]

print(classmates)

print(len(classmates))  # 列表长度
print(classmates[0])  # 列表第一项
print(classmates[-1])  # 列表最后一项

classmates.append("Adam")
print("添加", classmates)

classmates.insert(1, "Jack")
print("插入", classmates)

classmates.pop()
print("删除", classmates)

classmates.pop(1)
print("删除索引为 1 的项", classmates)

classmates[1] = "Alice"
print("修改", classmates)

元组初始化后不能修改

classmates = ("Michael", "Bob", "Tracy")
print(classmates[1])

t = (1, 2)
print(t)  # (1, 2)

t = ()
print(t)  # ()

t = 1
print(t)  # 1，因为 () 会被识别为运算符

t = (1,)
print(t)  # (1,)
# 1，因为 () 会被识别为运算符

score = "B"
match score:
    case "A":
        print("score is A.")
    case "B":
        print("score is B.")
    case "C":
        print("score is C.")
    case _:
        print("score is ???.")

age = 15
match age:
    case x if x < 10:
        print(f"< 10 years old: {x}")
    case 10:
        print("10 years old")
    case 11 | 12 | 13 | 14 | 15 | 16 | 17 | 18:
        print("11 ~ 18 years old")
    case 19:
        print("19 years old")
    case _:
        print("not sure")

args = ["gcc", "hello.c", "world.c"]
match args:
    case ["gcc"]:
        print("gcc: missing source file(s)")
    case ["gcc", file1, *files]:
        print("gcc compile: " + file1 + ", " + ", ".join(files))
    case ["clean"]:
        print("clean")
    case _:
        print("invalid command")

names = ["Michael", "Bob", "Tracy"]
for name in names:
    print(name)
print(list(range(100)))

sum = 0
for i in range(101):
    sum += i
print(sum)

sum = 0
n = 99
while n > 0:
    sum += n
    n -= 2
print(sum)
dict 中，字符串、整数都是不可变的，因此可以作为 key；
list 由于是可变的，因此不可以作为 key；
查看 dict 中的 value
判断 dict 中 key 是否存在

print("Alice" in d, "Michael" in d)
print(d.get("Alice", None), d.get("MIchael", None))
删除 dict 中某个 key

a = "abc"
b = a.replace("a", "A")  # replace 作用在 'abc' 上，而不是变量 a 上
print(a, b)
# replace 作用在 'abc' 上，而不是变量 a 上
